trans-unit.source: Represents the possible commit behaviors of a read/write property.
trans-unit.target: 表示读/写属性的可能的提交行为。

trans-unit.source: It is used as the value of a parameter of the <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementConfigurationAttribute"></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用的参数的值作为<xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementConfigurationAttribute"></xref>属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ WMI.NET 库都被视为在最终状态，不进一步开发、 增强功能，或更新将可供影响这些库的非安全相关问题。

trans-unit.source: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

This attribute is used as a parameter value for the <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementConfigurationAttribute> attribute only if the <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementCommitAttribute> attribute is used to identify a method to run to commit values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用作为参数值为<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementConfigurationAttribute>属性仅当<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementCommitAttribute>属性用于标识要运行以提交值的方法。</xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementCommitAttribute> </xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementConfigurationAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, read/write property values are applied automatically.
trans-unit.target: 否则，将自动应用读/写属性值。

trans-unit.source: Set values take effect only when Commit is called.
trans-unit.target: 仅当调用提交时，设置值将会生效。
